Summary: UFO sited in the sky, outside my home for approx 10 minutes.
divs: Sighting Details At approx 11:30 PM, late summer or early fall of 2008, I was looking out the kitchen window waiting for my wife to return from work, at which time I noticed something very unusual, in the sky. It was a display of red lights, in an irregular rectangular arrangement with no noticable solid form or mass. There was no aircraft attached to it. It hoovered for a while and also moved very slowly. I went outside to get a better look and then it moved to the back of my house and disappeared. Shortly after, my wife returned from work and asked me what was wrong, as I appeared, to her, to be distressed. I told her, "I just saw the wierdest thing", and proceded to tell her my observations. At her urging, I called the local police department to report what I had seen. I also asked them if anyone else had called tonight with a similar observation. They replied, "No." I recently watched a TV documentary regarding UFO's sighted in the Bucks County area (which is where I live). This gave some credability to my story. Today, the Trend newspaper, front page article features a story on Bucks UFO sightings, which further validates my experience.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Langhorne
There were no other sightings in Langhorne on or around October 15th 2008
